name: Combat Kyle
description:
THE WORLD’S FIRST 2.5D SINGLE-BUTTON INFINITE GUNNER!

Jump, shoot, and pivot as long as you can to fight off the alien invasion.

Blast through 6 different enemy types and an epic boss in this bizarre, unique, entertaining scene.

A daringly unique proof of concept with potential for a more expansive level design in the near future.

All graphics and code by Josh Swanson

CONTROLS

----------

Tap SPACE to shoot

Double-tap SPACE to jump

Hold SPACE to reverse
